import axios from 'axios'; import moment from 'moment'; import React, { useState } from 'react' const TcrMakeMateri = () => { const now = moment(); now.locale('id'); const hari = now.format('dddd'); const tanggal = now.format('dddd, DD MMMM YYYY - HH:mm'); const akun = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('akun')); const idCategory = akun.id_categori; const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ topic: akun.id, link: akun.id, id_category: idCategory, date: now.locale('id').format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') }); const handleOn = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/presensi', formData) .then(response => { window.location.href = "/teacher/makePresence" }) .catch(error => { console.log(error); }) } return (
